articles.title: Hanoi flooded by swollen river as Typhoon Yagi leaves 155 dead - Reuters
articles.description: Vietnam's capital of Hanoi evacuated thousands of people living near the swollen Red River as its waters rose to a 20-year high, flooding streets days after Typhoon Yagi battered the country's north, killing at least 155 people.
